properties.Land_Slide: Landsliding - In front of the Rathamba Engineering
properties.Proposed_M: It is advisable to mark reservaton and  remove unauthorized constructions. Constructing side walls, retaining walls (stone) is needed under the guidance of NBRO to prevent bank collapsing to the Welimada.
properties.photopath: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MWS003-GIS/MWS003-GIS.github.io/main/IWWRMP/Data/EXD/200_photo/MWS_044/In front of the Rathamba Engineering Landslid4.jpg

properties.Proposed_M: That area belongs to the Malwaththa Tea state company. Permission must be obtained from the company. Follow recommendations of NBRO.
